title: FairStars Audio Converter v1.97 Incl Crack and Key [TorDigger]
description:
FairStars Audio Converter

Brief Description:

FairStars Audio Converter is a media file conversion tool to convert WAV, RealMedia(RM, RA, RAM, RMJ, RMVB), AIF, AIFF, AIFC, AU, Creative VOC, PVF, PAF, SVX, IFF, APE, FLAC, OGG, VQF, MP1, MP2, MP3, MP4, M4A, M4B, AAC, AMR, AWB, WMA, WMV, ASF To WMA, MP3, AAC, M4A, AMR, AWB, VQF, OGG, FLAC, APE, WAV formats. You can convert multiple files in a single batch, regardless of their source and target formats. In addition, the program includes a built-in player. The audio format conversions are performed without any temporary files, allowing high conversion speeds. Other features include normalization (adjust volume), support for ID3 tags and more.

Main features:

Convert WAV, RealMedia(RM, RA, RAM, RMJ, RMVB), AIF, AIFF, AIFC, AU, Creative VOC, PVF, PAF, IFF, SVX, APE, FLAC, OGG, VQF, MP1, MP2, MP3, MP4, M4A, M4B, AAC, AMR(AMR-NB + AMR-WB), WMA, WMV, ASF To WMA, MP3, AAC, M4A(MP4 Audio), AMR(AWB), VQF, OGG, FLAC, APE ,WAV formats with different settings.
Fast Conversion Speed: audio format conversion is performed directly without any temporary files, and thus enables high converting speed and economy of hard disk resource.
Batch audio files conversion:You can convert many files in one batch regardless of their source formats.
Support automatic volume adjustment(normalization) when converting.
Support automatic saving ID3 Tags when converting, and also support ID3 tags display and edit.
Support Drag and Drop: supports dragging and dropping files or folders from the File Explorer into the window of FairStars Audio Converter.
Explorer-like file input dialog: allows you to navigate through supported files on your computer and add them to File List easily and quickly.
Easy-to-use user-friendly interface.

Supported File Formats:

Input Formats: WAV, RealMedia(RM, RA, RAM, RMJ, RMVB), AIF, AIFF, AIFC, AU, Creative VOC, PVF, PAF, IFF, SVX, APE, FLAC, OGG, VQF, MP1, MP2, MP3, MP4, M4A, M4B, AAC, AMR(AMR-NB + AMR-WB), WMA, WMV, ASF etc.
Output Formats: WMA, MP3, AAC, M4A(MP4 Audio, iPod MP4 Audio, iPhone MP4 Audio), AMR(AMR Narrowband), AWB(AMR Wideband), VQF, OGG, FLAC, APE, and WAV formats.

Note:

If you want to convert RealMedia files(RM, RA, RMJ, RAM, RMVB) to other audio format files, you need install RealMedia Codecs on your machine. Also please make sure that your RealMedia files could be played by your player first.
The conversion speed of RAM format file is slow, and it depends on the speed that you connects to the server linked by the RAM file.
DRM protected WMA and M4B files cannot be supported, and please try the converter before you order it.
Some .voc files are not Creative VOC format files, maybe they are RCA Voice files or other format files. They could not be supported by FairStars Audio Converter. If you found your voc files could not be converted, please try the Pro version - FairStars Audio Converter Pro, as it support more formats.
WAV format input support: PCM, MS-ADPCM, IMA-ADPCM, A-Law, u_Law, GSM610, Float-Double etc.

System Requirements:

Windows 2000/XP/2003/Vista/2008/7/8/8.1, 32bit or 64bit.
Full-duplex sound card

Homepage: http://www.fairstars.com/audio_converter/index.html

Installation Instructions:

- Install program.
- Copy content from crack folder and paste into default installation directory.
- Register Application with given Info in the key.txt file.
- Done, Enjoy.

Have A Nice Day
